title: How does Morde's dragon scale off of his damage?
body: Does the dragon scale off of AP, AD, or is it a flat amount based on game length?

replies.body: Dragon Ghost's damage is a combination of flat damage that scales with game time and % current health damage that remains constant. Neither component is affected by any of Morde's stats.
Does Morde's Physical penetration apply to the dragon's attacks?

It deals magic damage.

It applies magic penetration and spell effects.
